userTermsView.title: Terms and Conditions
userTermsView.title2: Consent for Personal Data Processing – U Platform
userTermsView.intro: By registering on the U platform, I acknowledge and accept, freely, informed, specifically and unequivocally, that my personal data will be collected, processed, and stored in accordance with international standards of privacy and data protection, based on the following conditions:
userTermsView.section1Text: Dsoft Innovate S.A.S. (hereinafter 'U'), identified with legal address at [legal address], acting as the data controller, will process my data according to this authorization.
userTermsView.section2Text: My personal data will be processed for the following purposes:

section2List.item1: Personalize the accessibility experience within the U widget.
section2List.item2: Allow analysis and aggregated reporting on the use of accessibility tools (without identifying the user individually).
section2List.item3: Provide technical support and personalized follow-up when necessary.
section2List.item4: Comply with legal and regulatory obligations regarding accessibility, inclusion, and non-discrimination.
section2List.item5: Send technical, informational, or commercial updates, only if I have given specific consent for it.

userTermsView.section3Text: U bases the processing of personal data on:

section3List.item2: Legitimate interest in improving accessibility services, always respecting the user's privacy.
section3List.item3: Compliance with local and international regulations, including GDPR (EU), CCPA (California), LGPD (Brazil), and other applicable data protection laws.

userTermsView.section4Text: Data may be transferred and/or stored on servers located in different countries. Unyco guarantees that when this occurs, standard contractual clauses and appropriate technical measures will be applied to protect the data in accordance with the GDPR and other applicable regulations.
userTermsView.section5Text: As the data owner, I have the right to:

section5List.item1: Access, rectify, limit, delete, or port my personal data.
section5List.item2: Withdraw my consent at any time.
section5List.item3: File complaints with the local data protection authority (such as the SIC in Colombia, EDPB in the EU, or FTC in the US).

userTermsView.section6Text: Data will be retained only for as long as necessary for the stated purposes or while the account remains active. Afterwards, they will be deleted or anonymized according to minimization principles.
userTermsView.section7Text1: You can exercise your rights by writing to: privacy@u.app
userTermsView.section7Text2: Or by visiting the form available at: www.u.app/privacy
userTermsView.helperText: Please read the entire document before accepting
userTermsView.checkboxLabel: I declare that I have read and accept the terms of personal data processing as set forth here.

userTermsView2.title: Terms and Conditions
userTermsView2.title2: Informed Consent on Data Use – Widget U
userTermsView2.intro: At U, we respect your privacy and want you to know exactly how we use your data.
userTermsView2.accept: By registering on our platform and using the widget, you accept that we collect and use certain information for the following purposes:
userTermsView2.section1Text: We only collect the data necessary to provide you with an accessible and personalized experience. This may include:

section1List.item2: Your country, language, and required accessibility level.
section1List.item3: Your type of disability (if you choose to share it).
section1List.item4: The settings you activate in the widget (for example: enlarge text, enable screen reader, etc.).

userTermsView2.section1Note: We do not collect banking data or access your personal content on the web.
userTermsView2.section2Title: Why do we use this information?

section2List.item1: To automatically adapt the widget to your needs.
section2List.item2: To generate anonymous and statistical reports that help improve digital access.
section2List.item3: To protect your accessibility rights, according to standards such as WCAG 2.2, GDPR, CCPA, and other local laws.
section2List.item4: If you agree to receive news, we will send you updates on new features or improvements to the widget.

userTermsView2.section3Text1: Only you and the system have access to your personal settings.
userTermsView2.section3Text2: If you decide to share your data with an institution (for example, a university that implements Unyco), they will only receive aggregated and anonymous reports, never individual data without your permission.
userTermsView2.section4Title: What control do you have over your information?

section4List.item1: You can modify or delete your account at any time.
section4List.item2: You can request a copy of the data we have about you.
section4List.item3: You can revoke this consent by writing to: privacy@u.app
